titles.title: Homeowners' Benefit Protection Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an inflation adjustment of the dollar limitation on the exclusion of gain on the sale of a principal residence.
Homeowners' Benefit Protection Act of 2005

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Homeowners' Benefit Protection Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for an annual inflation adjustment to the $250,000 limitation amount on the tax exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence.
